trans-unit.source: Represents a segment of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 表示一段<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from PathSegment, such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment>, represent specific types of geometric segments.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类从 PathSegment，如<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment>，表示特定类型的几何线段。</xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because PathSegment objects inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, they provide several special features: they can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **可冻结功能︰**因为 PathSegment 对象继承自<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>类，它们提供几个特殊功能︰ 可以声明为在多个对象之间共享，使只读的以提高性能，克隆，并进行线程安全。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features that are provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关不同功能提供的详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> by making deep copies of its values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改副本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>通过深层复制其值。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法生成的只读的可修改副本<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: When this method copies dependency properties, it copies resource references and data bindings although they might no longer resolve.
trans-unit.target: 当此方法复制依赖项属性时，会复制资源引用和数据绑定，但它们可能不再解析。

trans-unit.source: It does not copy animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 它不会复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改深层副本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the cloned object returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: <> </> *1> 克隆对象的属性返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使<> *1> 的源属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> object by making deep copies of its values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改副本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>通过深层复制其值的对象。

trans-unit.source: This method does not copy resource references, data bindings, and animations, although it does copy their current values.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，但复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法生成的只读的可修改副本<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改深层副本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <> </> *1> 属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使<> *1> 的源属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the join between this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> and the previous <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> is treated as a corner when it is stroked with a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否这之间的联接<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>和以前<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>时它用描边视为边角<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the join between this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> and the previous <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> is not to be treated as a corner; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果这之间的联接<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>和以前<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref>是不被视为角; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsSmoothJoin*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsSmoothJoin*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsSmoothJoin*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the segment is stroked.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否进行描边段。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> object has this property set to `true`, that object contributes to the stroked area of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> when rendered by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>对象具有此属性设置为`true`，该对象分配给描边区域的<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>一种<xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>呈现时</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure></xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true`, the extra area added by a Pen affects hit testing and explicit operations to widen the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为`true`，由钢笔影响添加的额外区域命中测试和显式操作，若要扩大范围<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>

trans-unit.source: When you switch between stroked and non-stroked <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> sections in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>, it is considered the same as the dashes of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: 你绘制和非描边<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>中<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>，它被认为是相同的一种<xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>短划线</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>部分</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>之间进行切换时

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.DashCap%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen> object determines the shape of the ends of stroked <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.DashCap%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>对象确定的末端的形状绘制<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.DashCap%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the segment is stroked when a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref> is used to render the segment; otherwise, the segment is not stroked.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果段进行描边时<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref>用于呈现段; 否则，不描边段。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsStroked*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsStroked*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsStroked*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
